content: super simple booties in the round with fitted sole skill level easy with some experience working in the round size - newborn to 3 mo easily made larger using worsted/bulky weight materials - one skein debbie bliss cashmerino 4 us size 4 double-pointed needles 3 1/2 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle for grafting gauge - 6 stitches to the inch abbreviations decrease - together st stitches pm pass marker k knit p purl kfb knit front and back increase one stitch k2tog knit 2 stitches together right slant decrease ssk slip slip knit left slant decrease techniques kfb k in front of st leave on needle k in back of st slide both st off 1 st made k2tog insert the rh needle through the first 2 stitches and k them together as one stitch right slant decrease ssk slip 2 stitches together at one time as if to knit then knit them together through the back of the loops left slant decrease directions begin at sole working in garter st cast on 20 stitches row 1 k10 place marker k10 20 st row 2 k1 kfb k6 kfb k1 pm repeat 24 st row 3 k3 kfb k4 kfb k3 pm repeat 28 st row 4 k1 kfb k10 kfb k1 pm repeat 32 st row 5 k3 kfb k8 kfb k3 pm repeat 36 st row 6 k1 kfb k14 kfb k1 pm repeat 40 st row 7 k3 kfb k12 kfb k3 pm repeat 44 st row 8 k across 44 st row 9 k across 44 st row 10 rearrange stitches as follows on first needle 6 st on second needle 16 st drop marker here on third needle 16 st on fourth needle 6 st row 11 to begin working in the round join and knit 6 st from last needle with with the 6 st on the first 12 st your work should now be on three needles needle a 16 st needle b 16 st the apex of needles a and b is center front needle c 12 st center back row 12 - 14 knit in the round a b then c to begin decr work-- row 15 on needle a k to last 4 st k2tog k2 decr 1 made a now holds 15 st on needle b k2 ssk k to end decr 1 made b now holds 15 st needle c knit the 12 st total st now on all needles - 42 row 16 on needle a k to last 4 st k2tog k2 a now holds 14 st on needle b k2 ssk k to end b now holds 14 st needle c knit the 12 st total st now on all needles - 40 row 17 25 repeat in this fashion decreasing 2 st each round until st on needles a and b are decr to 5 st each and total st in round is decr to 22 st row 26 27
